remarks: Scalar multiplication on a subspace in terms of scalar multiplication on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ssps.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
ssps.s $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ssps.r $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
ssps.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspsval $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( A R B ) = ( A S B ) ) $.
